alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Saline and central Pulaski Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Williams Junction, or 15 miles northwest of Benton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Benton... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... Otter Creek... Burns Park... Chenal Valley... Pinnacle Mountain State Park... Geyer Springs... Mabelvale... Salem in Saline County... Camp Robinson... Alexander... Amboy... Cammack Village... Bauxite... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
